thread.title: Social Media verdict: Twitter on Baba Rahman's Premier League debut
thread.title_full: Social Media verdict: Twitter on Baba Rahman's Premier League debut

title: Social Media verdict: Twitter on Baba Rahman's Premier League debut
text:
Sports News | 17 October 2015 18:55 CET Social Media verdict: Twitter on Baba Rahman's Premier League debut - www.allsports.com.gh 
Ghana international Abdul Baba Rahman made his English Premier League debut on Saturday against Jordan Ayew's Aston Villa at Stamford Bridge. 
Chelsea won the game by two goals to nil and this is how Twitter reacted to Abdul Baba Rahman getting his first Premier League game ... 
Baba Rahman arriving at Stamford Bridge. http://t.co/ZIQ9HAZe0I â€” TheChelseaViews (@TheChelseaViews) 2013-07-22 14:22:09.0 
For more sports news visit allSports.com.gh
